ValidationRule.description: Either of these should be entered to save the Contact : Primary Fax , Primary Email, Primary Work Phone. Providing excempt to Peoplesoft API user
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'API') ), NOT( CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'Admin') ), NOT( ISCHANGED( OwnerId ) ), AND( ISBLANK(Email),ISBLANK(Phone_3__c),ISBLANK(Phone_1__c),ISBLANK(Phone_5__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter at least one of these: Primary Email Address, Primary Work Number, Primary Cell Number or Primary Fax Number
